name: Godot Engine Game Pack
summary: Learn about .PCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To package game resources into a PCK file, Godot Engine developers select Project â†’ Export and then click Export PCK/Zip. This packs all the current project's resources into a PCK file, which can be distributed to players. (The game itself may also need to be modified to import the PCK file.)
PCK files typically contain some combination of the following types of game assets:

description: A PCK file is a resource pack created by Godot Engine, an open-source game engine used to create 2D and 3D games. It is used to update an existing Godot Engine game. It may include new game features, patches, or mods.

instructions: You can use the Godot Pck Tool (multiplatform) to extract the game assets a PCK file contains. You can also use Godot Pck Tool to list a PCK file's contents or add assets to the file.
